qbraid.circuits¶

Circuits (qbraid.circuits)¶

Overview¶

The qbraid circuit layer is designed as a lightweight infrastructure for creating circuits. Without the machinery to interface with devices directly, the qBraid circuit layer is built primarily for interfacing with the qBraid transpiler. For this reason, the structure of this circuit layer mirrors that of the transpiler wrapper classes closely.

The circuit layer also mirrors cirq in its use of moments and instructions. However, parameters are stored globally. Qubits are simply integers.

Example Usage¶

To create a circuit simply, the following code will suffice.

import numpy as np
from qbraid.circuits import Circuit, RX, drawer

circuit = Circuit(3) #create a circuit with 3 qubits
circuit.add_instruction('H',0)
circuit.add_instruction('RX',np.pi/2,2)
circuit.add_instruction('CX',[1,2])

crx_gate = RX(np.pi/4).control()
circuit.append(crx_gate([0,1]))

drawer(circuit)
...

The string passed to the add_instruction argument follows the convention of the transpiler, which is documented here.

For more explicit control over Moments, Instructions, and Gates, the following code shows how circuits can be created more directly.

from qbraid.circuits import Circuit, Instruction, Moment, H, RX, drawer
from numpy import pi

circuit = Circuit(3)

h = H()
instr_h0 = Instruction(h,0)
instr_h1 = Instruction(h,1)

moment = Moment([instr_h0,instr_h1])

instr_rx0 = RX(pi/2)(0)
instr_rx2 = RX(pi/4)(2)
circuit.append(moment)
circuit.append(instr_rx0)
circuit.append(instr_rx2)

drawer(circuit)

Circuits API¶

Circuit(num_qubits[, name, update_rule])

Circuit class for qBraid quantum circuit objects.

Gate(name, num_qubits[, params, global_phase])

Abstract class for gate library to extend and apply to instructions.

Instruction(gate, qubits)

Instructions are the class which define the qubits which the operators will act on.

Moment([instructions])

A time-slice of instructions within a circuit.

Qubit(index)

qBraid Qubit class

UpdateRule(name, doc)

Indicates preferences on how to add multiple operations to a circuit.

Parameter(name)

Parameter Class for variable parameters.

CircuitError(*message)

Base class for errors that occur when constructing circuits with the qBraid circuit layer.

drawer(circuit)

A rudimentary circuit drawer that prints out a string for each qubit.

Circuit Library (qbraid.circuits.library)¶

Standard Gates¶

The circuits library module for standard gates.

DCX([global_phase])

A 2-qubit double CNOT gate consisting of two CNOTs place back-to-back with alternating control qubits.

H([global_phase])

A single qubit rotation about the x+z axis bringing a state from the computational basis to the diagonal basis, i.e \(|+\rangle,|-\rangle\) basis.

CH([global_phase])

Controlled version of Hadamard Gate.

HPow([exponent, global_phase])

A power version of the Hadamard gate.

I([global_phase])

A single qubit identity gate that keeps qubit in same state for a wait cycle.

iSwap([global_phase])

Measure([global_phase])

Place a single qubit measurement to collapse the state of the qubit.

Phase(theta[, global_phase])

Single qubit rotation about the x-y plane.

CPhase(theta[, global_phase])

Controlled version of phase gate

pSwap([global_phase])

2 qubit swap gate that will swap the phase of two qubits

R(theta, phi[, global_phase])

Single qubit rotation gate for any rotation around the x-y plane with theta and phi parameters

RX(theta[, global_phase])

Single qubit x rotation gate for any rotation around the x-axis with theta parameter

RXX(theta[, global_phase])

2 qubit rotation gate for rotation around xx with theta parameter

RXY(theta[, global_phase])

2 qubit rotation gate for rotation about x-y plane with theta parameter

RY(theta[, global_phase])

Single qubit rotation gate for rotation around y-axis with theta parameter

RYY(theta[, global_phase])

2 qubit rotation gate for rotation about YY with theta parameter

RZ(phi[, global_phase])

Single qubit rotation gate for rotation around z-zxis with phi parameter

RZZ(phi[, global_phase])

2 qubit rotation gate about zz with phi parameter

RZX(theta[, global_phase])

2 qubit rotation gate about the x-z plane with theta parameter

S([global_phase])

Single qubit gate with rotation of pi/2 about z-axis

Sdg([global_phase])

Single qubit gate with rotation of -pi/2 about the z-axis

Swap([global_phase])

2 qubit gate that swaps the state of two qubits

SX([global_phase])

Single qubit Square Root X gate, or x gate to 1/2 power

SXdg([global_phase])

Single qubit negative Square Root X gate

T([global_phase])

Single qubit rotation of pi/4 about the z-axis

Tdg([global_phase])

Single qubit rotation of -pi/4 about the z-axis

U(theta, phi, lam[, global_phase])

Single qubit generic rotation gate with theta, phi, and lambda parameters

U1(theta[, global_phase])

Single qubit diagonal gate for rotations about the z-axis with theta parameter

U2(phi, lam[, global_phase])

Single qubit rotation about the x+z axis with phi and lambda parameters

U3(theta, phi, lam[, global_phase])

Single qubit generic rotation with theta, phi, and lambda parameters

X([global_phase])

Single qubit x gate, or bit flip gate

CX([global_phase])

Contorlled version of X gate

XPow([exponent, global_phase])

Power Gate version of X gate with specified power

Y([global_phase])

Single qubit Y gate

CY([global_phase])

Controlled version of Y gate

YPow([exponent, global_phase])

Power version of Y gate with specified power

CZ([global_phase])

Controlled version of Z gate

Z([global_phase])

Single qubit Z gate or phase flip gate

ZPow([exponent, global_phase])

Power version of Z gate with specified power

Generalized Gates¶

The circuits library module for generalized gates.

RV(v_x, v_y, v_z)

Unitary(name, num_qubits[, params, global_phase])

Unitary gate.
